channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India

item.title: White tiger kills visitor inside Delhi zoo
item.description: In a hair-raising incident which was captured live on cameras, a white tiger killed a visitor after he fell into the animal's moat in the Delhi zoo.

item.title: Maharashtra polls: Shiv Sena 'agrees to give 130 seats to BJP'
item.description: The Shiv Sena has agreed to give 130 seats to the BJP, bringing an end to the deadlock over seat-sharing for the Maharashtra assembly elections, according to Times Now.

item.title: Smoked meat deadlier than liquor, may increase risk of cancer
item.description: When meat or fish is cooked directly over fire, it gets covered with cancer-causing carcinogens, making it more dangerous than even smoking or consumption of alcohol, according to a study.

item.title: Live Blog: Saurav Ghosal wins India's first Asiad silver in squash
item.description: Abhinav Bindra ended his career by winning two bronze medals, whereas, Saurav Ghosal settled for India's first squash silver medal in the Asian Games.

item.title: Modi's action-packed US tour combines symbolism and substance
item.description: Modi will take to the world stage with his address to the UN General Assembly on September 27 and several bilateral meetings with gathered world leaders.
